title: 365 Nichi Kazoku
text:
"365 Nichi Kazoku" is a single release by the Japanese boyband Kanjani8. This release marks their 18th single. The single was used as the theme song for the Tokyo Broadcast Systems drama, Umareru.


== Track listing ==


=== Regular edition ===
"365 Nichi Kazoku" (３６５日家族, 365 Day Family) (5:43)
"Train in the Rain" (4:13)
"9 gousha 2 ban A seki" (9号車2番A席, 9th Cart, 2nd Row, Seat A) (5:11)
"Eightpop!!!!!!!!" (4:16)
"365 Nichi Kazoku (Original Karaoke)" (３６５日家族, 365 Day Family) (5:43)
"Train in the Rain (Original Karaoke)" (4:13)


=== Limited edition ===
"365 Nichi Kazoku" (３６５日家族, 365 Day Family) (5:43)
"Train in the Rain" (4:13)


==== DVD ====
"365 Nichi Kazoku" (３６５日家族, 365 Day Family)  Music Clip and Making
